mapper.sql: ACTC_UID, ACTIVITY_ID, ACTC_SORT, ACTC_TIME, ACTC_TIMEUNIT, ACTC_ASSIGN_TYPE, ACTC_ASSIGN_VARIABLE, SIGN_COUNT_VARNAME, ACTC_CAN_EDIT_ATTACH, ACTC_CAN_UPLOAD_ATTACH, ACTC_CAN_DELEGATE, ACTC_CAN_DELETE_ATTACH, ACTC_CAN_MESSAGE_NOTIFY, ACTC_CAN_MAIL_NOTIFY, ACTC_MAIL_NOTIFY_TEMPLATE, ACTC_CAN_REJECT, ACTC_REJECT_TYPE, ACTC_CAN_REVOKE, ACTC_CAN_AUTOCOMMIT, ACTC_CAN_ADD, ACTC_CAN_USER_TO_FIELD, ACTC_CAN_AUDIT_TO_FIELD, ACTC_CAN_APPROVE, ACTC_USER_TO_FIELD, ACTC_AUDIT_TO_FIELD, ACTC_OUTTIME_TRIGGER, ACTC_OUTTIME_TEMPLATE, ACTC_DESCRIPTION, ACTC_DEF_TITLE, ACTC_DEF_SUBJECT_MESSAGE, ACTC_DEF_MESSAGE, ACTC_DEF_DESCRIPTION, ACTC_ALERT, ACTC_PRIORITY_VARIABLE, ACTC_CAN_CANCEL, ACTC_CAN_PAUSE, ACTC_CAN_SKIP, UPDATOR, UPDATE_TIME, ACTC_CAN_CHOOSE_USER, ACTC_CAN_TRANSFER, ACTC_RESPONSIBILITY,ACTC_CHOOSEABLE_HANDLER_TYPE, ACTC_MESSAGE_NOTIFY_TEMPLATE, ACTC_CAN_SKIP_FROM_REJECT,ACTC_OUTTIME_NOTIFY_TYPE, ACTC_IS_SYSTEM_TASK, ACTC_DELAY_TYPE, actc_delay_time, actc_delay_timeunit, actc_delay_field

atc.ACTC_UID, atc.ACTIVITY_ID, atc.ACTC_SORT, atc.ACTC_TIME, atc.ACTC_TIMEUNIT, atc.ACTC_ASSIGN_TYPE, atc.ACTC_ASSIGN_VARIABLE, atc.SIGN_COUNT_VARNAME, atc.ACTC_CAN_EDIT_ATTACH, atc.ACTC_CAN_UPLOAD_ATTACH, atc.ACTC_CAN_DELEGATE, atc.ACTC_CAN_DELETE_ATTACH, atc.ACTC_CAN_MESSAGE_NOTIFY, atc.ACTC_CAN_MAIL_NOTIFY, atc.ACTC_MAIL_NOTIFY_TEMPLATE, atc.ACTC_CAN_REJECT, atc.ACTC_REJECT_TYPE, atc.ACTC_CAN_REVOKE, atc.ACTC_CAN_AUTOCOMMIT, atc.ACTC_CAN_ADD, atc.ACTC_CAN_USER_TO_FIELD, atc.ACTC_CAN_AUDIT_TO_FIELD, atc.ACTC_CAN_APPROVE, atc.ACTC_USER_TO_FIELD, atc.ACTC_AUDIT_TO_FIELD, atc.ACTC_OUTTIME_TRIGGER, atc.ACTC_OUTTIME_TEMPLATE, atc.ACTC_DESCRIPTION, atc.ACTC_DEF_TITLE, atc.ACTC_DEF_SUBJECT_MESSAGE, atc.ACTC_DEF_MESSAGE, atc.ACTC_DEF_DESCRIPTION, atc.ACTC_ALERT, atc.ACTC_PRIORITY_VARIABLE, atc.ACTC_CAN_CANCEL, atc.ACTC_CAN_PAUSE, atc.ACTC_CAN_SKIP, atc.UPDATOR, atc.UPDATE_TIME, atc.ACTC_CAN_CHOOSE_USER, atc.ACTC_CAN_TRANSFER, atc.ACTC_RESPONSIBILITY, atc.ACTC_CHOOSEABLE_HANDLER_TYPE,atc.ACTC_MESSAGE_NOTIFY_TEMPLATE, atc.ACTC_CAN_SKIP_FROM_REJECT, atc.ACTC_OUTTIME_NOTIFY_TYPE, atc.ACTC_IS_SYSTEM_TASK, atc.ACTC_DELAY_TYPE, atc.actc_delay_time, atc.actc_delay_timeunit, atc.actc_delay_field
mapper.select: select , tri1.tri_title actcOuttimeTriggerTitle,dnt.template_name actcMailNotifyTemplateView from DH_ACTIVITY_CONF atc left join dh_trigger tri1 on atc.ACTC_OUTTIME_TRIGGER = tri1.tri_uid left join dh_notify_template dnt on atc.actc_mail_notify_template = dnt.template_uid where ACTC_UID = #{actcUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into DH_ACTIVITY_CONF ()
select #{item.actcUid}, #{item.activityId}, #{item.actcSort}, #{item.actcTime}, #{item.actcTimeunit}, #{item.actcAssignType}, #{item.actcAssignVariable}, #{item.signCountVarname}, #{item.actcCanEditAttach}, #{item.actcCanUploadAttach}, #{item.actcCanDelegate}, #{item.actcCanDeleteAttach}, #{item.actcCanMessageNotify}, #{item.actcCanMailNotify}, #{item.actcMailNotifyTemplate}, #{item.actcCanReject}, #{item.actcRejectType}, #{item.actcCanRevoke}, #{item.actcCanAutocommit}, #{item.actcCanAdd}, #{item.actcCanUserToField}, #{item.actcCanAuditToField}, #{item.actcCanApprove}, #{item.actcUserToField}, #{item.actcAuditToField}, #{item.actcOuttimeTrigger}, #{item.actcOuttimeTemplate}, #{item.actcDescription}, #{item.actcDefTitle}, #{item.actcDefSubjectMessage}, #{item.actcDefMessage}, #{item.actcDefDescription}, #{item.actcAlert}, #{item.actcPriorityVariable}, #{item.actcCanCancel}, #{item.actcCanPause}, #{item.actcCanSkip}, #{item.updator}, #{item.updateTime}, #{item.actcCanChooseUser}, #{item.actcCanTransfer}, #{item.actcResponsibility}, #{item.actcChooseableHandlerType}, #{item.actcMessageNotifyTemplate}, #{item.actcCanSkipFromReject}, #{item.actcOuttimeNotifyType}, #{item.actcIsSystemTask}, #{item.actcDelayType}, #{item.actcDelayTime, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.actcDelayTimeunit}, #{item.actcDelayField} from dual
mapper.update:
update DH_ACTIVITY_CONF
updator = #{updator}, update_time = sysdate,
ACTIVITY_ID = #{activityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTC_SORT = #{actcSort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ACTC_TIME = #{actcTime,jdbcType=FLOAT},
ACTC_TIMEUNIT = #{actcTimeunit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTC_ASSIGN_TYPE = #{actcAssignType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTC_ASSIGN_VARIABLE = #{actcAssignVariable,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SIGN_COUNT_VARNAME = #{signCountVarname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTC_CAN_EDIT_ATTACH = #{actcCanEditAttach,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTC_CAN_UPLOAD_ATTACH = #{actcCanUploadAttach,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTC_CAN_DELEGATE = #{actcCanDelegate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTC_CAN_DELETE_ATTACH = #{actcCanDeleteAttach,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTC_CAN_MESSAGE_NOTIFY = #{actcCanMessageNotify,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTC_CAN_MAIL_NOTIFY = #{actcCanMailNotify,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTC_MAIL_NOTIFY_TEMPLATE = #{actcMailNotifyTemplate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTC_CAN_REJECT = #{actcCanReject,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTC_REJECT_TYPE = #{actcRejectType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTC_CAN_REVOKE = #{actcCanRevoke,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTC_CAN_AUTOCOMMIT = #{actcCanAutocommit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTC_CAN_ADD = #{actcCanAdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTC_CAN_USER_TO_FIELD = #{actcCanUserToField,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTC_CAN_AUDIT_TO_FIELD = #{actcCanAuditToField,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTC_CAN_APPROVE = #{actcCanApprove,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTC_USER_TO_FIELD = #{actcUserToField,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTC_AUDIT_TO_FIELD = #{actcAuditToField,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTC_OUTTIME_TRIGGER = #{actcOuttimeTrigger,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTC_OUTTIME_TEMPLATE = #{actcOuttimeTemplate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTC_DESCRIPTION = #{actcDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTC_DEF_TITLE = #{actcDefTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTC_DEF_SUBJECT_MESSAGE = #{actcDefSubjectMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTC_DEF_MESSAGE = #{actcDefMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTC_DEF_DESCRIPTION = #{actcDefDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTC_ALERT = #{actcAlert,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTC_PRIORITY_VARIABLE = #{actcPriorityVariable,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTC_CAN_CANCEL = #{actcCanCancel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTC_CAN_PAUSE = #{actcCanPause,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTC_CAN_SKIP = #{actcCanSkip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTC_CAN_CHOOSE_USER = #{actcCanChooseUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
actc_Can_Transfer = #{actcCanTransfer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
actc_Responsibility = #{actcResponsibility,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTC_CHOOSEABLE_HANDLER_TYPE = #{actcChooseableHandlerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTC_MESSAGE_NOTIFY_TEMPLATE = #{actcMessageNotifyTemplate},
ACTC_CAN_SKIP_FROM_REJECT = #{actcCanSkipFromReject},
ACTC_OUTTIME_NOTIFY_TYPE = #{actcOuttimeNotifyType},
ACTC_IS_SYSTEM_TASK = #{actcIsSystemTask},
ACTC_DELAY_TYPE = #{actcDelayType},
ACTC_DELAY_TIME = #{actcDelayTime},
ACTC_DELAY_TIMEUNIT = #{actcDelayTimeunit},
ACTC_DELAY_FIELD = #{actcDelayField},
where ACTC_UID = #{actcUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
